tutors.bio: Chris is an undergraduate math major who enjoys learning about a wide range of topics, going all the way from ethics to matrix algebra. He has more than 3 years of tutoring experience for university students, with more than 20 students this past year. He absolutely loves working with students one-on-one and in groups. If you are interested in talking to him, do not hesitate to email him and inquire.
tutors.name: Chris Scholl
